document_data.caption: A map of Malatra, probably not showing the Ranu River.
document_data.name: Ranu River
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Ranu River''' was a river in the [[Kuong Kingdom]] in [[Malatra]].<ref group="note">Like many locations in the Kuong Kingdom, the Ranu River has not been labelled on any map of Malatra. The rivers that are depicted are likely to be other named rivers.

At the mouth of the Ranu River lay the trade town of [[Srelanat]]. From here, the [[Srelanat Road]] went overland to the [[Kunong River]].
